name: Magnus Carlsen
description: A universal and highly resilient player, known for deep positional play, endgame mastery, and relentless pressure.

explanation.Aggressiveness: Carlsen is not overly aggressive but exerts constant pressure on opponents.
explanation.RiskTaking: He takes calculated risks rather than speculative ones.
explanation.KingSafety: Always ensures his king is safe, avoiding unnecessary exposure.
explanation.PieceActivity: His pieces are well-coordinated and placed optimally.
explanation.PawnStructure: Carlsen maintains strong pawn structures to support strategic play.
explanation.KnightPair: He values knights for maneuvering but does not favor them over bishops.
explanation.BishopPair: He uses bishops effectively but does not overly rely on them.
explanation.Defense: Carlsen is extremely solid and rarely blunders.
explanation.CalculationDepth: His calculations are deep and precise.
explanation.EndgameKnowledge: His endgame mastery is among the best in history.
explanation.PieceSacrifice: He sacrifices pieces only when it provides a clear strategic or tactical advantage.
explanation.CenterControl: Controls the center with strong positional understanding.
explanation.PositionClosure: Comfortable in both open and closed positions, adapting as needed.
explanation.PieceTrade: Trades pieces efficiently to reach favorable endgames.
explanation.PositionalSacrifice: Occasionally sacrifices material for long-term positional gain.
explanation.KnightVsBishop: Neutral preference, adapting to the position.
explanation.PawnPush: Pushes pawns carefully, improving position without unnecessary weaknesses.
explanation.OpenFileControl: Uses open files effectively for piece coordination.
explanation.RookActivity: Carlsen places his rooks efficiently on open files, maximizing their potential.
explanation.PawnStorm: Rarely engages in aggressive pawn storms, preferring positional buildup.
explanation.SacrificeFrequency: He sacrifices very rarely, only when the position demands it.
explanation.KingMobility: Carlsen knows when to activate his king in the endgame for maximum efficiency.
explanation.PieceCoordination: His pieces work together harmoniously, ensuring optimal positioning.
explanation.HumanImperfection: Carlsen makes very few mistakes, playing nearly error-free chess.
